title: Roast poussin with chestnut stuffing
ingredients: ['3 poussins', 'salt and pepper to taste', '3 tablespoons butter, softened', '2 shallots, minced', '3 sticks celery', '250g chestnuts - cooked, peeled and chopped', '4 garlic cloves, minced', '1 pear - cored, peeled and chopped', '4 sprigs fresh marjoram', '1/2 onion, coarsely chopped', '4 carrots, coarsely chopped', '5 sprigs fresh parsley', '200ml chicken stock', '200ml white wine', '2 to 3 tablespoons single cream', 'cornflour, to thicken gravy']
